content: Forget it, I just found out it is a fictitious hospital. Whew, I was getting worked up over nothing. This message has been edited. Last edited by: R102, Tue 03 March 2009 04:30 AM
reply: Forget it, I just found out it is a fictitious hospital. Whew, I was getting worked up over nothing. This message has been edited. Last edited by: R102, Tue 03 March 2009 04:30 AM
title: Eugencis to a home near you!

content: Every time I read of such stuff, I'm reminded of these two verses from the Bible: (2 Timothy 3:1-5 NIV) But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. {2} People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, {3} without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, {4} treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God-- {5} having a form of godliness but denying its power. Have nothing to do with them. Mat 24:22 And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: ...
